sys_metadata_link.payload: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="x_62500_mealplan_recipe"> <x_62500_mealplan_recipe action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <active>true</active> <cook_time>1970-01-01 00:25:00</cook_time> <cooking_instructions>1. Heat vegetable oil in a pot over medium heat. 2. Add panang curry paste and cook until fragrant. 3. Stir in coconut milk and bring to a simmer. 4. Add thinly sliced beef sirloin and cook until almost done. 5. Add sliced red bell pepper and green beans. 6. Simmer until beef is cooked through and vegetables are tender. 7. Season with fish sauce and brown sugar. 8. Add kaffir lime leaves and stir well. 9. Serve hot over cooked jasmine rice.</cooking_instructions> <cuisine display_value="Thai">8b495a179791021069a3b6fce053afd0</cuisine> <diet/> <effort display_value="Moderate">bee0a76e9730021069a3b6fce053af3e</effort> <image/> <ingredients/> <meal_type display_value="Dinner">ca8516df9751021069a3b6fce053afdf</meal_type> <name>Panang Curry</name> <nutrition>Calories: 500, Protein: 30g, Fat: 25g, Carbs: 35g</nutrition> <owned_by display_value="MP Admin">cbb877e697b0021069a3b6fce053af41</owned_by> <pre_cook>false</pre_cook> <prep_instructions>1. Thinly slice beef sirloin. 2. Slice red bell pepper.</prep_instructions> <prep_required>false</prep_required> <prep_time>1970-01-01 00:20:00</prep_time> <serving>2</serving> <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2024-04-07 01:56:01</sys_created_on> <sys_id>ca5917d797d5021069a3b6fce053afdd</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count> <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2024-05-01 06:39:11</sys_updated_on> <time_of_day/> </x_62500_mealplan_recipe> </record_update>
